caller_intent: The caller requested assistance in Spanish and confirmed they had already received a callback, seeking resolution for an unspecified issue.
resolution_steps: Agent apologized for lacking Spanish-speaking staff and offered to have someone call back.
Caller confirmed they had already received a callback.
Agent checked their system to see if JC (possibly a contact) had attempted to call.
Agent stated they would try to connect the caller with someone.
summary: A Spanish-speaking caller requested assistance after confirming they had already received a callback. The agent checked their system for prior contact attempts and committed to connecting the caller with appropriate support, though the call ended before resolution.
